publicationPlace: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh
title: The speech of the Right Reverend Anthony Bishop of Meath when the clergy waited on His Majesty at his camp nigh Dublin, July 7, 1690 : together with His Majesty's most gracious answer.
author: Dopping, Anthony, 1643-1697.
publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
